attributes.action: Prevent the DVLA from selling personal information to parking firms.
attributes.additional_details: The DVLA should not be giving away personal information to these companies. Personal information should be given to relevant authorities only.
attributes.background: Many people get unfair parking fines from companies like Parking eye and Corporate parking. These companies have no authority to demand excessive charges. They rely on bullying tactics and threats, with some unfairly giving out CCJs to people who are often unaware.
